Notes.Text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-44070: Fixed missing stream length check before TLV value is taken in bgp_attr_encap (bsc#1229438)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting (FRR) through 10.1. bgp_attr_encap in bgpd/bgp_attr.c does not check the actual remaining stream length before taking the TLV value.
